deleteMeFavorites.doc: Deletes the given track from the logged-in user's list of favorites.

deleteMeFollowings.doc: Deletes the user with the id contact_id from the logged-in user's list of contacts.

deleteUserFavorites.doc: Deletes the given track from the given user's list of favorites.

deleteUserFollowings.doc: Removes the user with the id contact_id from the givens user's list of contacts.

exports['getTrackSecret-token'].doc: Returns the secret token for a track by track id. This resource can only be used by the track owner.

getComment.doc: Returns a comment by comment id

getGroup.doc: Returns a group by group id

getGroupContributors.doc: Returns a collection of contributors of the group with group id

getGroupMembers.doc: Returns a collection of members of the group with group id

getGroupModerators.doc: Returns a collection of moderators of the group with group id

getGroupTracks.doc: Returns a collection of tracks contributed to the group with group id

getGroupUsers.doc: Returns a combined collection of moderators, members and contributors of the group with group id

getMeComments.doc: Returns a collection of comments made by logged-in user

getMeFavorites.doc: Returns a collection of tracks favorited by the logged-in user

getMeFollower.doc: Checks if the user with the id contact_id is a follower of the logged-in user

getMeFollowers.doc: Returns a collection of users who follow the logged-in user

getMeFollowing.doc: Checks if the user with the id contact_id is in the logged-in user's list of contacts.

getMeFollowings.doc: Returns a collection of users the logged-in user is following

getMeGroups.doc: Returns a collection of groups joined by logged-in user

getMePlaylists.doc: Returns a collection of playlists created by the logged-in user

getMeTracks.doc: Returns a collection of tracks uploaded by logged-in user

getPlaylist.doc: Returns a playlist by playlist id

getTrack.doc: Returns a track by track id

getTrackComments.doc: Returns comments of a track by track id

getTrackPermissions.doc: Returns all users with permission for a track by track id

getUser.doc: Returns a user by user id

getUserComments.doc: Returns a collection of comments made by user id

getUserFavorites.doc: Returns a collection of tracks favorited by the user with user id

getUserFollower.doc: Checks if the user with contact_id is a follower of the given user.

getUserFollowers.doc: Returns a collection of users who follow the user with user id

getUserFollowing.doc: Checks if the user with the id contact_id is in the givens user's list of contacts.

getUserFollowings.doc: Returns a collection of users the user with user id is following

getUserGroups.doc: Returns a collection of groups joined by user with user id

getUserPlaylists.doc: Returns a collection of playlists created by user with user id

q.doc: Most endpoints will accept a q param which you can use to specify a keyword to search for in fields like title, username, description, etc. depending on the resource type.

getUserTracks.doc: Returns a collection of tracks uploaded by user id

postTrackComments.doc: Posts a comments to a track by track id

putMeFavorites.doc: Adds the given track to the logged-in user's list of favorites.

putMeFollowings.doc: Adds the user with the id contact_id to the logged-in user's list of contacts.

putTrackPermissions.doc: Updates the list of permitted users for a track by track id

putTrackSecretToken.doc: Resets the secret token for a track by track id. The secret token can not be specified but will be randomly chosen on          the server and returned. This resource can only be used by the track owner.

putUserFavorites.doc: Adds the given track to the given user's list of favorites.

putUserFollowings.doc: Adds the user with the id contact_id to the givens user's list of contacts.

resolve.doc: Translates a website URI into an API URI
